name: presumptuousness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of showing little respect for others by doing things you have no right to do: They were accused of arrogance and presumptuousness. There was a certain presumptuousness to this sudden announcement. See
presumptuous
More examplesFewer examplesPeople were surprised by the actor’s presumptuousness in running for mayor with no experience of city politics.In the end, his presumptuousness left him looking foolish.It’s hard to believe the sheer presumptuousness of her proposals.
